title: Council Directive 92/93/EEC of 9 November 1992 amending Directive 75/275/EEC concerning the Community list of less- favoured farming areas within the meaning of Directive 75/268/EEC (Netherlands)
header:
COUNCIL DIRECTIVE 92/93/EEC of 9 November 1992 amending Directive 75/275/EEC concerning the Community list of less-favoured farming areas within the meaning of Directive 75/268/EEC (Netherlands)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Directive 75/275/EEC is hereby replaced by the Annex attached hereto.
This Directive is addressed to the Kingdom of the Netherlands.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 9 November 1992.
For the Council
The President
D. HURD
(1) OJ No L 128, 19. 5. 1975, p. 1. Directive as last amended by Regulation (EEC) No 797/85 (OJ No L 93, 30. 3. 1985, p. 1).(2) OJ No C 260, 9. 10. 1992, p. 8.(3) Opinion delivered on 30 October 1992 (not yet published in the Official  Journal).(4) OJ No L 128, 19. 5. 1975, p. 229. Last amended by Directive 88/403/EEC (OJ No L 195, 23. 7. 1988, p. 72).
